dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a benchmark suite for various tasks in computer vision, particularly focused on autonomous driving. It includes a diverse set of images and annotations for 3D object detection, tracking, and segmentation.
dcterms:title: KITTI Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset provides a comprehensive set of data for vision and robotics, including stereo images, 3D point clouds, and annotations for various tasks such as object detection and tracking.
dcterms:title: KITTI Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Chen
K. Kundu
Y. Zhu
A. G. Berneshawi
H. Ma
S. Fidler
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The Penn Action Dataset consists of videos of people performing various actions, annotated with 3D joint locations for human pose estimation.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset
